citeinfo.origin: National Park Service (NPS) Geologic Resources Inventory (GRI) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Surficial Units of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts and Vicinity, Virginia (NPS, GRD, GRI, WOTR, WOTR digital map)

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service (NPS) Geologic Resources Inventory (GRI) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Geologic Map of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts and Vicinity, Virginia

descript.abstract: The Digital Surficial Units of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts and Vicinity, Virginia consists of GIS data. Please see the GRI digital map metadata record (wotr_metadata.txt) for additional information. The data were completed as a component of the Geologic Resources Inventory (GRI) program, a National Park Service (NPS) Inventory and Monitoring (I&M) funded program that is administered by the NPS Geologic Resources Division (GRD). The data were captured, grouped and attributed as per the NPS GRI Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 2.1. (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm). The data is within the area of interest of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts.
descript.purpose: The data are intended to assist NPS personnel in the protection and management of Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is just one component of the WOTR digital map. Please see the GRI digital map metadata record (wotr_metadata.txt) for additional information.
